description: This recipe is my take on the kontosouvli, a souvlaki marinated in oregano and chilli. Kontosouvli is best known from Cyprus and is usually described as a souvlaki made with larger marinated pieces of pork. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need skewers.

show.b0667qf6: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul

steps: Mix all the marinade ingredients in a bowl and add the meat. Marinate for an hour or so.
Thread the cubes of meat on to skewers. Grill on a barbecue or under a hot grill for 10–12 minutes, turning until cooked through.
title: Pork souvlaki with oregano
